ISSUE.TITLE: The `load_yaml()` convenience method on BaseScript should use SafeLoader
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### NetBox Version v4.2.7 ### Python Version 3.10 ### Steps to Reproduce N/A ### Expected Behavior The [`load_yaml()`](https://github.com/netbox-community/netbox/blob/44cb1a913957329c24554094b782b894a7410dec/netbox/extras/scripts.py#L527) method on BaseScript should use the SafeLoader class for safety. ### Observed Behavior The default Loader class is used.
